channel.title: Projects on Success by Design
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Success by Design

item.title: Evaluate Project Team
item.description: Sample https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/learn/modules/explore-roles-responsibilities-world-of-data/ Certifications https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/learn/certifications/browse/?products=azure Evaluate Project Team Readiness What are the roles and skillsets required for a successful implementation using Azure Synapse Analytics? Synapse Administrator Synapse Database Administrator Synapse Data Engineer Synapse Data Analyst Synapse Data Scientist Azure Administrator Azure Security Engineer Azure DevOps Engineer Synapse Administrator A Synapse Administrator is responsible for the administration of the overall Azure Synapse environment.

item.title: Evaluate Project Plan
item.description: In the project’s lifecycle, the most important and extensive planning is performed before implementation. This article will provide a high level QUICK review of the project plan to make sure it contains critical artifacts and information for a successful project. Below is the checklist of items that must be defined and approved before the project is initiated. The Project Plan Core Resource Team – core group of key people, each of whom offers expertise crucial to the project.
